attributes.action: Restriction on charities television IMAGERY dipicting African and Asians as POOR
attributes.additional_details: Charities such as water aid,save the children and sight savers use images that are simply not right to highlight the problem they are looking to provide solution to. Problem is this images are grotesque. Even charities for animal issue have better imagerys
attributes.background: Impose restrictions on charities television advertisements imagery that depict African and Asians in a non flattery way to generate funds and thus perpetuating stereotypes which encourages racism

rejection.details: The UK Government is not responsible for the content and tone of campaign materials produced by charities, and there are regulators in place to consider complaints against a charity on the basis of their fundraising or advertising. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-charity.
